Plot model and Outliers

Source: R/ggoutliers.R
ggoutliers.Rd

Plot model and Outliers

ggoutliers(
  formula,
  data,
  mod = loess,
  n.sd = 1.5,
  ...,
  selected = NULL,
  add.to.selected = NULL,
  ngenes = 6,
  yvar.ngenes = ngenes,
  xvar.ngenes = ngenes,
  gene.min = 0.5,
  alt.min = 0.5,
  xlab.min = 0,
  ylab.min = 0,
  xlab.max = NULL,
  ylab.max = NULL,
  text.size = 16,
  legend.text.size = 12,
  label.size = 3.5,
  segment.colour = "grey85",
  segment.size = 0.15,
  min.segment.length = 0.5,
  nudge_y = 0,
  force = 5,
  xlab = all.vars(formula)[2],
  ylab = all.vars(formula)[1],
  selected.col = "red",
  subtitle = NULL,
  midline = TRUE,
  outerlines = FALSE,
  title = NULL,
  caption = NULL
)

Arguments

formula

PARAM_DESCRIPTION

data

PARAM_DESCRIPTION

mod

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: loess

n.sd

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: 1.5

...

PARAM_DESCRIPTION

selected

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: NULL

add.to.selected

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: NULL

ngenes

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: 7

yvar.ngenes

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: ngenes

xvar.ngenes

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: ngenes

gene.min

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: 3

alt.min

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: 1

xlab.min

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: 0

ylab.min

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: 0

text.size

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: 14

legend.text.size

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: 12

label.size

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: 5

force

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: 20

xlab

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: all.vars(formula)[2]

ylab

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: all.vars(formula)[1]

selected.col

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: 'red'

subtitle

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: NULL

title

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: NULL

caption

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: NULL

Value

OUTPUT_DESCRIPTION

Details
